title: Love Means Nothin'
description: Melody Gray visits New York City for her best friendâ€™s wedding, meeting tennis pro John Spencer at the train station, stopping him from running away. She wishes she could stay with him instead of returning to her abusive father in West Virginia. But her father needs her to take care of him and John's mother hates Melody. She has to leave the man she loves, to go back to her lonely life. Priced low for people to afford, it's approximately 265 pages in length. Written in third person--romance.
author: Markee Anderson
